message: Hello everyone! I'm excited to be part of this game and looking forward to getting to know all of you better. I believe collaboration and strategy will be key as we navigate through the rounds. I’m eager to hear your thoughts and ideas, and I hope we can create a fun and engaging atmosphere together. Let’s make the most of this opportunity and see how we can outlast each other while enjoying the process! Good luck to all!

Hello, fellow players! I'm P7, and I'm thrilled to be here. I think this game will be a great test of our social skills and strategic thinking. I'm interested in forming alliances and understanding everyone's unique perspectives. Let's keep the communication open and honest, and see where this journey takes us. Looking forward to our interactions and hoping we can all learn something new from this experience. Best of luck to everyone!

Looking forward to seeing how this dynamic evolves and who stands out as genuine or cunning. Good luck to us all!
